headline: Cyberattacks on Holocaust educational websites increased in 2022
keywords: Holocaust, Project Galileo, Judeoflare, Israel, Jewish, Attacks, Impact Report, Trends
description:
Today, 78 years after the liberation of the Auschwitz death camp, we mark the International Holocaust Remembrance Day.
With Cloudflareâ€™s Project Galileo, we protect Holocaust educational websites and at risk public interest groups. Read more to see how attacks on these groups increased in 2022.
